origin_prompt.content: 我想了解当前的金融科技人才市场趋势。首先，获取LinkedIn和Glassdoor过去一年的金融科技职位发布历史数据。然后，获取当前LinkedIn和Glassdoor的实时金融科技职位发布数据。接着，分析这两个平台的金融科技职位需求趋势。最后，基于分析结果，提供一个金融科技人才投资策略建议。

prediction:
To gather the financial technology (fintech) job market trend data from LinkedIn and Glassdoor, you can follow these steps:

1. **Data Collection from LinkedIn**

a. Go to LinkedIn's website and log in to your account.
b. In the search bar, type "financial technology jobs" or "fintech jobs."
c. On the search results page, click on "Jobs" to narrow down the search to job postings.
d. On the left-hand side of the page, you'll see filters. Click on "Date Posted" and select "Past year."
e. Scroll down to the bottom of the results page and set the location filter to your desired geography (e.g., country, state, city).
f. Click on "Apply Filter" to see the job postings that match your search criteria.
g. As you scroll down the page, you'll see job postings listed. You can click on any job listing to see the job details.
h. For each job posting, write down the job title, company name, job description, and any relevant keywords.
i. Repeat steps g-h for as many job postings as you can collect.

2. **Data Collection from Glassdoor**

a. Go to Glassdoor's website and log in to your account.
b. In the search bar, type "financial technology jobs" or "fintech jobs."
c. Select the location filter to your desired geography (e.g., country, state, city).
d. Click on "Jobs" to narrow down the search to job postings.
e. On the left-hand side of the page, you'll see filters. Click on "Date Posted" and select "Past year."
f. Scroll down to the bottom of the results page and apply the filters by clicking on "Apply Filter."
g. As you scroll down the page, you'll see job postings listed. You can click on any job listing to see the job details.
h. For each job posting, write down the job title, company name, job description, and any relevant keywords.
i. Repeat steps g-h for as many job postings as you can collect.

3. **Current Financial Technology Job Market Trend Analysis**

After collecting data from both LinkedIn and Glassdoor, analyze the collected data to identify trends and patterns. You can do this by:

a. Calculating the total number of job postings for both platforms.
b. Comparing the job postings from both platforms to identify any differences or similarities.
c. Identifying popular job titles, companies
